casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintel Martinez AUGUSTINE 130A03-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2018 Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Durham, James E. Ferguson, II, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Augustine, Quintel Martinez. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of March 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of March 2018."
